name: Titanfall - The Final Hours
description: Written over the past four years, journalist Geoff Keighley ("The Final Hours of Portal 2") chronicles the making of TITANFALL from Respawn Entertainment. This longform app features never-before-seen photos, video and concept art from early development versions of the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista® Home Premium, Business, Ultimate, or Enterprise (including 64 bit editions) with Service Pack 2, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Classic Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices Memory: 512 MB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I really feel sorry for the idiots who bought this app thinking it was a game and then posted a negative review because they can't read.  I'm not even sure how they figured out how to use a computer with that level of intelligence.  I bought this app just so I could say this.  as mockingly,  as possible.

Definatly worth the $2. If you don't know the game, WHICH THIS IS NOT! IT'S A VIDEO, and you want to get a real feel for it this is it. It's not long. It's interactive and has artwork and interviews. I wish they had this for all games. Most of all I wish Steam sold the game. Not sure why they have this and not the game. It's like advertizement for Origin.

I thought this was a game, not a friggin diary. but still thanks to it i leveled up soooooo..... thumbs up!!! And on the plus side i'm trying to make a game too so this will be a great college book for a story
♥♥♥♥ i thought this was the game 'titan fall' can i hav my money bck pls?
What a waste of money, do not buy.
